transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Krishna sir.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Kekura.
Executive: Ha kekura.
Executive: Ha solunga sir, system on pannikonga appo pesalam.
Customer: Okay okay sir. Anna sir namma unga side la irunthu neenga update panni tharennu sonninga.
Executive: Adhan category mapping mudichiten naanu.
Customer: Okay. Oru nimisham open pannunga.
Customer: Unga namma catalog open panni konjam India mart system mattum tha irukingala?
Customer: Illa sir naan system illa ippo veliyila irukom.
Executive: Mobile la mobile la open pannunga appo.
Customer: Open pannitengala mobile la?
Executive: Ha mobile open pannunga.
Executive: Vera entha place la changes venumnu sollunga anga kooda naan pannaren.
Customer: Ha sollunga sir open pannitten.
Executive: Oru nimisham number open pannikonga 960 51 000.

Customer: Ippo chrome ponga chrome poittu.
Executive: Chrome ponga.
Customer: Chrome ponga.
Executive: Seller.indiamart.com ponga.
Executive: Idhu yaan namma mobile app illama idhula porom appidina namma system la paakura maariye paakalaam.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Seller.indiamart.com.

Customer: Open pannitten sir.
Executive: Namma India mart open pannitingala?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Number device potingala naan sonnathu mattum pannitingala seller.indiamart.com potu.
Customer: Neenga sonna maari thaan seller.indiamart.com. Ippo first option enaku kaamikuthu sir.
Executive: Dashboard profile lead manager buyleads.
Customer: Oru nimisham.
Customer: Neenga irukura page la screenshot anuppunga whatsapp la.
Executive: Whatsapp message poturunga paaru.
Customer: Screenshot anuppava?
Executive: Ha screenshot anuppunga.
Executive: Message poturunga.

Executive: Mudichiduchu oru nimisham.
Executive: Idhula products ponga.
Customer: Products irukaa?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Products click pannitingana right corner la vandhu more option nu solli option kaamikudha?
Customer: Right corner la more options three dot kaamikuthu.
Executive: Three dot click pannunga.
Customer: Adhula all active rejected andha maari.
Executive: Oru nimisham naan inga open pannikiren.

Customer: Andha maari edhum illa sir product photo thaan list aaguthu.
Executive: Appo anga enna aagumnna anga potta udane vandhu ungaluku more option nu solli kaamikuvom neenga products click panna udane right corner product list varuma?
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Adhu fullaave appadi thaan varuthu.
Executive: Ungaluku screenshot anuppuren paarunga.
Customer: Anuppunga.

Customer: Anuppitten paarunga.
Executive: Oru nimisham.

Customer: Ha idhu vandhu neenga mobile app la irukingala?
Executive: Adhu chrome la irukkumbodhu appadi thaan sir irukkum chrome la thaan sir irukkum appo neenga enna pannunganna chrome la vandhu left corner la oru three dot irukkum adha click panni desktop view kudunga.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Desktop view kuduthitinganna marupadiyum adhu eppom poliye use pannikalaam neenga system la paakura maariye irukkum.
Customer: Okay okay.

Executive: Chrome la adhe maari seller dot potuttu.
Customer: Hmm ippo varuthu sir.
Executive: Idhula.
Executive: Idhula products click pannitingala?
Customer: Hmm click pannitten.
Executive: Click panna udane right corner la vandhu more option nu solli irukkum andha page click panna udane first enna enna products la potrukomo adhu varum adhukappuram namma andha more option nu solli irukkum whatsapp la screenshot anuppichiruken paarunga andha maari.
Customer: More option irukku.
Executive: Andha more option click pannunga.
Customer: Hmm. Pannna udane keela category report nu solli onnu varudha?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ippo naan enna enna categories la map pannirukeno adhu vandhu adhu kaamikum ungaluku ippo first irukkum keela ovvoru product ku munnadi kutti kutti arrow open aaguthungala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Andha arrow click illama adhuku right side vandhu oru sila categories laame podalaam ippo for example vandhu irunga naan inga open pannikiren.
Executive: For example vandhu ippo paracetamol injection oru product irukku appidina adhu kaalta enna enna keyword laam podalaam appidinga solli right side kaamikuvom.
Customer: Hmm. Ippo naan potrukkuradhu ellaame oru alavukku enaku therinja knowledge la idhu varaikum oru sila customers la panniruppom la.
Customer: Hmm. Adha vachi naan panniruken in case idhellaam edhu ungaluku irrelevant aa irukko adha remove pannannum appidina.
Customer: Hmm. Andha product name primary nu solli kaamikuthungala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Adhuku pakka adha cursor anga kondu poninganaale anga cancel pannra maari option kaamikuvom remove mapping nu solli.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Anga remove pannikalaam aama idhu vandhu super ah irukkum ungaluku in case unga marupadiyum add pannannum appidina namma product la poi add pannikalaam.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm. Ippo idhuku onnume naan sonna maari direct aa ungaluku inquiries vandhu varum actually.
Customer: Hmm. Oru one week idhoda reflection eppadi irukku nu paarunga.
Customer: Hmm. Innaikku enna monday ingala coming thursday friday varaikum oru four five days paarunga eppadi irukku nu solli indha alavukku nalla improve aaguthu nu paarunga.
Customer: Hmm. Nalla improve aachunna.
Executive: Matha products fullaave namma full search la kondu vandhuralaam okay ngala?
Customer: Hmm. Hmm.
Executive: Yenna namma implement pannirukkom evvalavu quick aa evvalavu fast aa evvalavu inquiries varuthu nu paathuttu oru traction paathuttu but aanaa ippo two weeks mela aayiduchu sir idhu trust seal activate aagiye namakku onnum direct inquiries varalainga sir namma palaiya business palaiya package eduthome andha maari thaan ippayum enaku irukkura maari theriyuthu.
Executive: Illa namma vandhu 24th thethila post aayirukku naan last aa namma oru thadava pesuvom la.
Customer: Aama sir 24th thethina ippo two days aayiduchu.
Executive: Hmm. 24th thethi post aayirukku namakku leads.

Executive: Innumey ungaluku order eh convert eh aagala sir.
Customer: Direct inquiries laam andha alavukku illa namma first package eduthome adhuleye one month mattum thaan direct inquiries neraiya vandhuchu adhukappuram romba slow aayiduchu.
Executive: Oru nimisham irunga naan open pannikiren.

Executive: Illa poga poga onnume traction irukkum ungaluku yenna service eduthu kaatti neenga august la irundhu neenga leads edukkuradhu increase pannitte irukinga.
Customer: Hmm. Adhanaala vandhu ungaluku inquiries slow aa adhikaama varum ungaluku naan whatsapp la screenshot anuppuren paarunga andha screenshot vandhu neenga ovvoru maasam evvalavu leads india mart la eduthuttu irukinga appidingarathu okay ngala? Illa buyleads laam ellaame use pannirrom direct inquiries vandhu neenga trust seal eduthaa neraiya varumnninga.
Executive: Aama ippo ippo ten days aayirukku hosting thaan ungaluku poga poga increase aagum buyleads neenga consume pannitte iruppinga buyleads ratio increase aayitte irukkum unni further aa vandhu inquiries oda ratio increase aayitte irukkum neenga lead manager layum appappa check pannitte irunga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: In case oru customer eh call pannraanga appidina missed call from vandhaa kooda ungaluku idhula kaamikiren.
Customer: Aama adhu la kaatta naan call panni laam pesitte thaan irukkom.
Executive: Hmm. Ippo further aa poga poga onnume increase aagum yenna leads neenga automatically increase pannirunga increase aagum correct ngala?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Yenna neenga 24th thethi post aanaalume adhukappuram ungaluku vandhu post buylead allocation vandhu ungaluku ippo nadandhirukkum.
Customer: Hmm. Vellikizhamai post aayirukku sanikkizhamai ungaluku vandhu buylead allocate aayirukku poga poga vandhu nalla improve panni varum okay ngala?
Customer: Sari okay.
Executive: Edhume irundhaa enaku koopidunga kipsanukkum neenga koopidalaam enakkum kipsan ariya share panna koopidalaam neenga okay ngala?
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Sari neenga free aayittu evening koopidungala konjam work la irukkaa?
Executive: Okay sir free aayittu kooda message pannunga naane kooda ungaluku koopiduren.
Customer: Hmm sari okay.
Executive: Okay sir okay sir thank you.
Customer: Okay ngala?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states direct inquiries are not increasing.

- Feels current package is same as old one.



Resolution:

- Executive explained category mapping is completed.

- Executive provided steps to check category report.

- Executive said to check after 4-5 days for improvement.

- Executive said buylead allocation happened recently.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and call if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, direct inquiries, trustseal
